contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = ''Saiphos'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Scincidae]] | genus = '''''Saiphos''''' | genus_authority = [[John Edward Gray|J.E. Gray]], 1831{{Verify source|date=July 2007}} | species = '''''S. equalis''''' | binomial = ''Saiphos equalis'' | binomial_authority = (J.E. Gray, 1825) | synonyms = Genus-level: *''Siaphos''<br/><small>J.E. Gray, 1839 (unjustified emendation)</small> | range_map = Three-toed Skink.png | range_map_caption = Distribution of the Three-toed Skink }} '''''Saiphos''''' is a [[monotypic]] [[genus]] of [[skink]]s. ''"Siaphos" tridigitus'', initially placed here, is now reassigned to the "[[wastebin taxon]]" ''[[Sphenomorphus]]'' pending a review of that assemblage. ==References== * '''Greer''', Allen E.; David, Patrick & TeyniÃ©, Alexandre (2006): The Southeast Asian scincid lizard ''Siaphos tridigitus'' Bourret, 1939 (Reptilia, Scincidae): a second specimen. ''Zoosystema'' '''28'''(3): 785-790. [http://www.mnhn.fr/museum/front/medias/publication/8650_z06n3a13.pdf PDF fulltext] [[Category:Skinks]] {{skink-stub}}
